name: The Cursed Key
overview: Oh dear. You're in for it now. You decide to visit a disused house and then find the door is locked from behind you. You have indeed got yourself in a spot of bother. Welcome to the Mad Scientist's haunted house. Inspired by the Mikro-Gen games, this adventure is guaranteed to drive you nuts. Your quest is to solve puzzles and find the cursed key. Unfortunately for you, the house is haunted and full of ghostly antics. Grab and use various items to unlock more rooms and try to find that key so you can escape. If the ghosts and other deadly object touch you. Energy will be drained. As soon as all of your energy has been drained, a life will be lost. If all of your lives are lost, then you're banished in the haunted house for the rest of your life. Can you escape or will you have to face the fact that there's no escape?
